title: Failed to launch RADS/system/rads_user_kernel.exe
body: I simply removed the shortcut of lol from my homescreen and I cant open my League now. It popped up and error saying It failed to launch RADS system...(full message is the title) What do I do to fix it?

replies.body: The patcher needs access to scan and update game files, otherwise you may end up seeing an error like this.  You can fix this up by going through the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide.  That should get you squared away, but let me know if you have any questions!
